name: @alvarosabu/world
author: Alvaro Saburido <hola@alvarosaburido.dev> (https://github.com/alvarosabu/)
description: AS 20XX Personal Portfolio, Blog, CV, Labs

scripts.changelog: echo 'generate master changelog' && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.ci:version: pnpm changelog && pnpx changeset version && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile --shamefully-hoist && git add .
scripts.ci:publish: pnpm build:all && git status && pnpm publish -r && pnpm changeset tag
